content: This Circus Monkey will use its gong to rally the troops and alert any Frozen Corpses nearby to rise and ambush you. Luckily, he's not too strong on his own and can be taken out quickly before focusing on the others.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Towers of Karma'.
The content is as follows:
This Circus Monkey will use its gong to rally the troops and alert any Frozen Corpses nearby to rise and ambush you. Luckily, he's not too strong on his own and can be taken out quickly before focusing on the others.
